an4.192:1.3: Samvasena, bhikkhave, silam veditabbam, tanca kho dighena addhuna, na ittaram; manasikarota, no amanasikarota; pannavata, no duppannena.
an4.192:1.4: Samvoharena, bhikkhave, soceyyam veditabbam, tanca kho dighena addhuna, na ittaram; manasikarota, no amanasikarota; pannavata, no duppannena.
an4.192:1.5: Apadasu, bhikkhave, thamo veditabbo, so ca kho dighena addhuna, na ittaram; manasikarota, no amanasikarota; pannavata, no duppannena.
an4.192:1.6: Sakacchaya, bhikkhave, panna veditabba, sa ca kho dighena addhuna, na ittaram; manasikarota, no amanasikarota; pannavata, no duppannenati.
an4.192:2.1: ‘Samvasena, bhikkhave, silam veditabbam, tanca kho dighena addhuna, na ittaram; manasikarota, no amanasikarota; pannavata, no duppannena’ti,
an4.192:2.2: iti kho panetam vuttam. Kincetam paticca vuttam?
an4.192:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, puggalo puggalena saddhim samvasamano evam janati:
an4.192:2.4: ‘digharattam kho ayamayasma khandakari chiddakari sabalakari kammasakari, na santatakari na santatavutti;
an4.192:3.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, puggalo puggalena saddhim samvasamano evam janati:
an4.192:3.2: ‘digharattam kho ayamayasma akhandakari acchiddakari asabalakari akammasakari santatakari santatavutti;
an4.192:3.4: ‘Samvasena, bhikkhave, silam veditabbam, tanca kho dighena addhuna, na ittaram; manasikarota, no amanasikarota; pannavata, no duppannena’ti, iti yam tam vuttam idametam paticca vuttam.
an4.192:4.1: ‘Samvoharena, bhikkhave, soceyyam veditabbam, tanca kho dighena addhuna, na ittaram; manasikarota, no amanasikarota; pannavata, no duppannena’ti,
an4.192:4.2: iti kho panetam vuttam. Kincetam paticca vuttam?
an4.192:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, puggalo puggalena saddhim samvoharamano evam janati:
an4.192:4.4: ‘annatha kho ayamayasma ekena eko voharati, annatha dvihi, annatha tihi, annatha sambahulehi;
an4.192:5.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, puggalo puggalena saddhim samvoharamano evam janati:
an4.192:5.2: ‘yatheva kho ayamayasma ekena eko voharati, tatha dvihi, tatha tihi, tatha sambahulehi.
an4.192:5.5: ‘Samvoharena, bhikkhave, soceyyam veditabbam, tanca kho dighena addhuna, na ittaram; manasikarota, no amanasikarota; pannavata, no duppannena’ti, iti yam tam vuttam idametam paticca vuttam.
an4.192:6.1: ‘Apadasu, bhikkhave, thamo veditabbo, so ca kho dighena addhuna, na ittaram; manasikarota, no amanasikarota; pannavata, no duppannena’ti,
an4.192:6.2: iti kho panetam vuttam. Kincetam paticca vuttam?
an4.192:6.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco natibyasanena va phuttho samano, bhogabyasanena va phuttho samano, rogabyasanena va phuttho samano na iti patisancikkhati:
an4.192:6.4: ‘tathabhuto kho ayam lokasannivaso tathabhuto ayam attabhavapatilabho yathabhute lokasannivase yathabhute attabhavapatilabhe attha lokadhamma lokam anuparivattanti loko ca attha lokadhamme anuparivattati—
an4.192:6.5: labho ca, alabho ca, yaso ca, ayaso ca, ninda ca, pasamsa ca, sukhanca, dukkhanca’ti.
an4.192:6.6: So natibyasanena va phuttho samano bhogabyasanena va phuttho samano rogabyasanena va phuttho samano socati kilamati paridevati, urattalim kandati, sammoham apajjati.
an4.192:7.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco natibyasanena va phuttho samano bhogabyasanena va phuttho samano rogabyasanena va phuttho samano iti patisancikkhati:
an4.192:7.2: ‘tathabhuto kho ayam lokasannivaso tathabhuto ayam attabhavapatilabho yathabhute lokasannivase yathabhute attabhavapatilabhe attha lokadhamma lokam anuparivattanti loko ca attha lokadhamme anuparivattati—
an4.192:7.3: labho ca, alabho ca, yaso ca, ayaso ca, ninda ca, pasamsa ca, sukhanca, dukkhanca’ti.
an4.192:7.4: So natibyasanena va phuttho samano bhogabyasanena va phuttho samano rogabyasanena va phuttho samano na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattalim kandati, na sammoham apajjati.
an4.192:7.5: ‘Apadasu, bhikkhave, thamo veditabbo, so ca kho dighena addhuna, na ittaram; manasikarota, no amanasikarota; pannavata, no duppannena’ti,
an4.192:7.6: iti yam tam vuttam idametam paticca vuttam.
an4.192:8.1: ‘Sakacchaya, bhikkhave, panna veditabba, sa ca kho dighena addhuna, na ittaram; manasikarota, no amanasikarota; pannavata, no duppannena’ti,
an4.192:8.2: iti kho panetam vuttam. Kincetam paticca vuttam?
an4.192:8.3: Idha, bhikkhave, puggalo puggalena saddhim sakacchayamano evam janati:
an4.192:8.4: ‘yatha kho imassa ayasmato ummaggo yatha ca abhiniharo yatha ca panhasamudaharo, duppanno ayamayasma, nayamayasma pannava.
an4.192:8.6: Tatha hi ayamayasma na ceva gambhiram atthapadam udaharati santam panitam atakkavacaram nipunam panditavedaniyam.
an4.192:8.7: Yanca ayamayasma dhammam bhasati tassa ca nappatibalo sankhittena va vittharena va attham acikkhitum desetum pannapetum patthapetum vivaritum vibhajitum uttanikatum.
an4.192:9.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, cakkhuma puriso udakarahadassa tire thito passeyya parittam maccham ummujjamanam.
an4.192:9.3: ‘yatha kho imassa macchassa ummaggo yatha ca umighato yatha ca vegayitattam, paritto ayam maccho, nayam maccho mahanto’ti.
an4.192:9.4: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo puggalena saddhim sakacchayamano evam janati:
an4.192:9.5: ‘yatha kho imassa ayasmato ummaggo yatha ca abhiniharo yatha ca panhasamudaharo, duppanno ayamayasma, nayamayasma pannava.
an4.192:9.7: Tatha hi ayamayasma na ceva gambhiram atthapadam udaharati santam panitam atakkavacaram nipunam panditavedaniyam.
an4.192:9.8: Yanca ayamayasma dhammam bhasati, tassa ca na patibalo sankhittena va vittharena va attham acikkhitum desetum pannapetum patthapetum vivaritum vibhajitum uttanikatum.
an4.192:10.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, puggalo puggalena saddhim sakacchayamano evam janati:
an4.192:10.2: ‘yatha kho imassa ayasmato ummaggo yatha ca abhiniharo yatha ca panhasamudaharo, pannava ayamayasma, nayamayasma duppanno.
an4.192:10.4: Tatha hi ayamayasma gambhiranceva atthapadam udaharati santam panitam atakkavacaram nipunam panditavedaniyam.
an4.192:10.5: Yanca ayamayasma dhammam bhasati, tassa ca patibalo sankhittena va vittharena va attham acikkhitum desetum pannapetum patthapetum vivaritum vibhajitum uttanikatum.
an4.192:11.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, cakkhuma puriso udakarahadassa tire thito passeyya mahantam maccham ummujjamanam.
an4.192:11.3: ‘yatha kho imassa macchassa ummaggo yatha ca umighato yatha ca vegayitattam, mahanto ayam maccho, nayam maccho paritto’ti.
an4.192:11.4: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo puggalena saddhim sakacchayamano evam janati:
an4.192:11.5: ‘yatha kho imassa ayasmato ummaggo yatha ca abhiniharo yatha ca panhasamudaharo, pannava ayamayasma, nayamayasma duppanno.
an4.192:11.7: Tatha hi ayamayasma gambhiranceva atthapadam udaharati santam panitam atakkavacaram nipunam panditavedaniyam.
an4.192:11.8: Yanca ayamayasma dhammam bhasati, tassa ca patibalo sankhittena va vittharena va attham acikkhitum desetum pannapetum patthapetum vivaritum vibhajitum uttanikatum.
an4.192:12.1: ‘Sakacchaya, bhikkhave, panna veditabba, sa ca kho dighena addhuna, na ittaram; manasikarota, no amanasikarota; pannavata, no duppannena’ti, iti yam tam vuttam idametam paticca vuttam.
an4.192:12.2: Imani kho, bhikkhave, cattari thanani imehi catuhi thanehi veditabbani”ti.
